Activity: Arrive at work, grab coffee, and check emails and art feeds.
Review yesterday's weapon sketches and select two designs to develop further. Focus on designs that feel unique and fit the game's aesthetic.

Create more detailed sketches of the chosen weapon designs. Pay attention to the functionality and how they would be held and used by the player. I will also think about if these weapons would have an alternate fire mode.
Add details like lights, vents, and energy conduits to the weapon designs. Think about how these elements would animate and function during gameplay.
Lunch Break. Explore the city in order to find some design inspirations.
Create quick color studies for each weapon design. Experiment with different energy colors and material finishes.

Present the weapon designs to @Ldes-1 and @Prod-1 for feedback. Ask for their opinions on the overall design, functionality, and visual impact. I will ask them about their opinions for these weapons to incorporate with the first person view of the character.
Incorporate feedback from @Ldes-1 and @Prod-1. Refine one design based on their suggestions.
Prepare the final weapon design sketch for potential 3D modeling. Add notes on materials, colors, and animation.
Save work, shut down computer, and head home.
